channel.title: Receiving item when talking 2 npc
channel.description: ok i have the full proper chat system working, and i have seen tuts be4 mass clean that they were able to give an item?? if any 1 could give me 1 like of code, there is a back rub in it 4 ya!

item.title: Receiving item when talking 2 npc
item.dc:creator: @waterslicer waterslicer
item.description:
@waterslicer wrote:

eh…
thats…really not understandable.
if you want a code for items then i have a few
oh talking to an npc???
i dunno that
i use a pimpscape quest and yes for quest rewards they do give u items.

heres a few item codes

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“white”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(1048, 3);
addItem(2637, 3);
addItem(4567, 3);
addItem(6611, 3);
addItem(6617, 3);
addItem(6619, 3);
addItem(6623, 3);
addItem(6625, 3);
addItem(6627, 3);
addItem(6629, 3);
addItem(6633, 3);
sendMessage(“The blessed will rise.”);
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“black”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(1165, 3);
addItem(1195, 3);
addItem(1327, 3);
addItem(1647, 3);
addItem(1666, 3);
addItem(2636, 3);
addItem(2635, 3);
addItem(1125, 3);
addItem(1077, 3);
addItem(1089, 3);
addItem(4125, 3);
addItem(7457, 3);
sendMessage(“The dark side will always quench your thirst for blood.”);
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“rares”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
addItem(1049, 3);
addItem(1047, 3);
addItem(1045, 3);
addItem(1043, 3);
addItem(1041, 3);
addItem(1039, 3);
addItem(1037, 3);
addItem(1051, 3);
addItem(1054, 3);
addItem(1056, 3);
addItem(1048, 3);
sendMessage(“rare time!”);
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“money”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(995, 2147483647);
sendMessage(“it’s gold, it’s satisfying, it’s money!!!”);
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“initiate”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(5575, 7);
addItem(5574, 7);
addItem(5576, 7);
sendMessage(“the temple monks give you this gift, recieve it carefully.”);
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“blessing”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(4038, 1);
addItem(3840, 1);
addItem(2667, 1);
addItem(2665, 1);
addItem(2663, 1);
addItem(2661, 1);
addItem(2415, 1);
sendMessage(“you are now officially blessed”);
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staves”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(2415, 1);
addItem(2416, 1);
addItem(2417, 1);
addItem(84, 1);
addItem(1094, 1);
sendMessage(“the power of five is invincible!!!”);
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“archer”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(892, 2147483647);
addItem(859, 1);
sendMessage(“type ‘::range’ to go range now!”);
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“food”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
addItem(397, 28);
sendMessage(“save some for me! lol drools”);
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“magic”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
addItem(6603, 1);
addItem(4109, 1);
addItem(4111, 1);
addItem(4113, 1);
addItem(4115, 1);
sendMessage(“I wanna be a real ghost!”);
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“ghostly”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
addItem(6106, 1);
addItem(6107, 1);
addItem(6108, 1);
addItem(6109, 1);
addItem(6110, 1);
sendMessage(“I wanna be a real ghost!”);
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“bones”) && playerRights >= 1)
{

sendMessage(“bones are definitely for buring!!!”);
}
